name: Meta Visual Art
description:
The Meta-Visual Exhibition, which brings together technology and creativity, aims to transcend traditional boundaries of art and provide an original perspective on the future of art. Filled with virtual installations and interactive experiences, this exhibition combines the works of contemporary artists with virtual setups to offer viewers a unique art experience.

Interaction

Meta-Visual not only showcases artworks but also pushes the boundaries of art by allowing viewers to interact with the pieces. By merging art with the advantages of the digital world, Meta-Visual aims to provide art enthusiasts with an experience beyond being mere spectators.

Aesthetic Convergence with Technology

This special exhibition aims to redefine traditional art appreciation by providing a platform for art enthusiasts who wish to delve into the depths of art through virtual reality. The Meta-Visual Exhibition seeks to merge the evolution of technology with art, offering visitors a memorable and inspiring art experience.

Multiplayer

Experience a collective multiplayer in a gallery you can visit from anywhere.
